sentences.sContent: In fact, for a time, I flip-flopped between wanting to be an archaeologist and a paleontologist as a child, haha.
sentences.sContent_eng: In fact, for a time, I flip-flopped between wanting to be an archaeologist and a paleontologist as a child, haha.
sentences.sCn: 实际上有一段时间，我在长大以后成为考古学家还是古生物学家上伤透了脑筋，哈哈。

sentences.sContent: The punctuated equilibrium hypothesis attemptsto explain a curious feature of the fossil record --- one that hasbeen familiar to paleontologist for more than a century but hasusually been ignored.
sentences.sContent_eng: The punctuated equilibrium hypothesis attemptsto explain a curious feature of the fossil record --- one that hasbeen familiar to paleontologist for more than a century but hasusually been ignored.
sentences.sCn: 这种强调均衡的理论尝试解释化石记录的奇怪之处——这点古生物学家已经了解超过一个世纪了却常常把他忽略。

words.tran: 古生物病理学；古病理学
